description:
BetArabia invites you to a world-class online gaming experience brought to you by Casino Du Liban, Lebanon’s exclusive gaming authority since 1957. With the launch of BetArabia in 2022, Casino Du Liban has taken a bold step forward, offering the first and only online gaming platform licensed by the Lebanese Ministry of Finance.

Dive into our extensive and ever-growing selection of games, including Slots, Casino classics, Poker, and a comprehensive Sportsbook that covers thousands of global markets. Whether you’re a fan of traditional Casino games or eager to test your skills in our immersive Live Casino, BetArabia has something for every player. Sports enthusiasts will love our robust Sportsbook, offering live betting and streaming of major football leagues and matches from around the world.

BetArabia is optimized for mobile play, making it easy to deposit, withdraw, and enjoy your favorite games on the go, whether you're using a smartphone or tablet. Our sleek, user-friendly interface ensures a seamless gaming experience, whether you choose to download the app or play directly in your browser. Plus, our dedicated Live Customer Service team, based in Lebanon, is available 24/7 to assist you in English, Arabic, and French.

The ultimate MENA gaming experience is just a tap away — download BetArabia today and bring world-class gaming right to your fingertips!

Join over 20 million fans who trust FotMob to keep them informed.

FotMob gives you all the live scores, stats, and news you need to keep up with football from anywhere in the world. With personalized alerts and lightning fast match updates, you'll always stay informed about your favorite teams and players. Our mission is simple: We're changing the way the world follows football.

Key features include:
• Live scores with instant goal notifications
• Personalized news and alerts for your favorite clubs and players
• Home screen widgets with news and live matches
• Detailed match stats, including xG and shot maps
• Video highlights and audio commentary
• Live text commentary to follow the action as it happens
• Transfer updates and breaking news
• TV schedules so you know exactly when and where to watch
• Weekly Team of the Week (TOTW) and player ratings

We cover more than 400 competitions globally, including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, MLS, Champions League, Liga MX, FA Women’s Super League, Eredivisie, World Cup 2026, and many more.

Stay connected and share your feedback we'd love to hear from you:
X: X.com/fotmob
Instagram: instagram.com/fotmobapp
Facebook: facebook.com/fotmob
TikTok: tiktok.com/@fotmobapp
Web: www.fotmob.com

The official app for Globe Soccer Awards.

Also, don’t forget to tune in for the streaming video, live from the Awards gala.

The official app allows to:

- Keep track of the nominees and winners

This app is made for extreme sports enthusiasts who love adventure and adrenaline. Plan your activities, track your performance, and analyze your progress across multiple sports. Get personalized safety recommendations and insights into your physical condition. Record achievements, review detailed statistics, and stay motivated to reach new heights in every adventure.

Experience SPORTS and Entertainment Anywhere, Anytime!
 
Stream on tablets and mobile devices wherever you are and dive into a world of high-quality live streaming that includes:
• Top global sports tournaments on beIN SPORTS channels.
• Blockbuster movies and trending series for unforgettable moments.
• Kids' channels to keep the little ones entertained.
 
A unique and all-inclusive experience that includes:
▪ High Quality Premium Channels, including 4K Channel.
▪ High speed streaming with low Latency (as less as 15 seconds latency from satellite service).
▪ Personalized Reminders and Push Notifications service to keep you updated on the latest matches.
▪ Cast to TV via Airplay and Chromecast to watch on the big screens.
▪ Adaptive Player with any connection speed for the best watching experience.
▪ Quality Selector ranging from Full HD to Data Saver.
▪ Interactive TV Guide showcasing live events and replays on all channels.

 
This service is exclusively available for users in the Middle East and North Africa region.

Stay ahead of every match with this football score app, your ultimate football score companion! Get real-time football scores, upcoming match schedules, and detailed player & team statistics.

Key Features:

- football Scores – Instant updates with real-time tracking.
- Upcoming Match Schedule – Plan ahead with fixtures and match timings.
- Top Players & Stats – Track top scorers, assists, and key player performances.
- Match Alerts & Reminders – Never miss a game with custom notifications.
- Detailed Team & Player Stats – View standings, performance data, and match insights.

Whether you're a casual fan or a sports enthusiast, football score app keeps you updated with every match detail! Stay connected, track scores, and never miss a moment of the action.

For an uninterrupted experience, consider subscribing to access all app features without ads through an auto-renewing subscription available on a weekly, monthly, or yearly basis. Manage your subscription settings and turn off auto-renewal within your iTunes Account Settings after purchase, ensuring flexibility and control over your subscription.

Current subscription may not be canceled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.

Read our full Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy at:

Link to Privacy Policy: https://sgappsapple.blogspot.com/p/privacy-policy.html

Link to Terms of use: https://sgappsapple.blogspot.com/p/terms-conditions.html

Yacine TV - ياسين تيفي delivers live football scores, match updates, and league standings from competitions worldwide. Get instant access to match information, detailed statistics, and real-time updates.

Features:

- Live Scores: Track ongoing matches with real-time score updates, goals, cards, and substitutions.
- Match Details: View complete match information, event timelines, venue details, and team statistics.
- League Standings: Browse complete league tables with team rankings, points, and goal differences. Color-coded positions show Champions League, Europa League, and relegation zones.
- Today's Fixtures: See all scheduled matches with times in your local timezone.
- Global Coverage: Search and follow football leagues from around the world. Save your favorites for quick access.
- Customization: Switch between dark and light themes. Pull-to-refresh for instant updates.


Subscriptions & Premium Access:

Yacine TV - ياسين تيفي offers optional auto-renewable subscriptions to unlock premium features and an ad-free experience:
- Weekly Plan: $4.99 per week
- Monthly Plan: $13.99 per month
- Yearly Plan: $24.99 per year
- Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/matchlivecrf/home
- Terms of use: https://sites.google.com/view/terms-live-yacine/home

Payments are handled securely through your Apple ID. Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage or cancel your subscriptions at any time via your device settings.

Yacine TV - ياسين تيفي provides everything you need to follow football in a clean, fast, and easy-to-use app.

Discover a simpler way to connect with your favorite sports academies, gyms, and wellness studios. With in2, everything you need is in one app:

• Stay updated with schedules & announcements

Trusted by thousands of users across the Middle East, in2 helps people train, play, and grow — all in one place.

Own your game with Statbox. 

Get your matches recorded at partner venues, view auto‑generated highlights, and track detailed performance stats—then compete with friends through challenges and leaderboards.

What you can do:

-Get your footage: Access match replays and share highlight links of your top moments.
-See your stats: Goals, assists, shots on/off target, chances created, successful dribbles, saves, and more—tracked over time.
-Climb leaderboards: Compare performance, discover tiers and levels, and track progress.
-Join challenges: Enter community challenges and earn points as you play.
-Create or join matches: Set up games at partner venues or join with a match code or invite link.
-Stay connected: Post updates, like and comment, manage friends, and get real‑time notifications.
-Multi‑sport support: Optimized today for football (soccer) and padel, with profiles and stats for each.

Stay ahead of every sporting moment with live scores, stats, and schedules. Follow the biggest leagues in the world, including the Premier League, Champions League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Brasileirão Série A, and Ligue 1. Track every phase of the NBA, EuroLeague, NCAA, and top tennis tournaments like Wimbledon, Roland Garros, US Open, Australian Open, and the ATP & WTA Tours—all in one app.

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB
• Tennis - ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), Davis Cup
• Table Tennis - ITTF World Table Tennis Championships, Table Tennis World Cup
• Ice Hockey - NHL, KHL, IIHF World Championship
• eSports - LoL, Dota 2, CS:GO 2
• Handball - IHF World Handball Championship, Bundesliga, EHF Champions League
• Volleyball - FIVB Volleyball World Championship, Nations League, Champions League
• Baseball - MLB, LMB, Pro Yakyu - NPB
• American Football - NFL, NCAA
• MMA - UFC, Bellator, KSW, Rizin, PFL
• Motorsport - Formula 1, NASCAR, MotoGP, WRC
• Cricket - ICC World Cup, Indian Premier League (IPL)

and the rest of the sports we cover - Rugby, Darts, Snooker, Futsal, Minifootball, Badminton, Aussie Rules, Beach Volleyball, Water polo, Cycling, Floorball, Bandy.

Privacy policy: https://www.sofascore.com/privacy-policy
Terms of use: https://www.sofascore.com/terms-and-conditions

OnePlayr brings the real and digital football world together in one unique app. Whether you’re a player, fan, or scout, there’s a place for everyone on OnePlayr. Share your football videos, participate in challenges, and earn credits to redeem for exclusive rewards. Your personalized Playr Card evolves with your progress, making you visible to scouts and clubs. For fans, OnePlayr offers the opportunity to support rising stars and even share in their success. Dive into a social media-style video feed, challenge your skills against other talents, and connect with a vibrant football community!

beIN SPORTS is the ultimate destination for sports fans — bringing you the latest news, videos, highlights, live scores, standings, and expert analysis on the teams, leagues, and stars you love.



What makes us different?



- Personalized for you: Select your favorite sports, leagues, and teams — we’ll serve the content that matters most.
- Stay in the game: Get real-time push notifications for goals, match updates, and key moments from your favorite teams.
- Exclusive access: Watch the latest highlights and goals from the world’s top leagues, only on beIN SPORTS.
- At a glance: Our news & results widget keeps the top stories and live scores just one tap away.

Your ultimate live scores and sports news app. Goals, scores, and stories, all on Flashscore. Follow all the latest highlights across the world of sport, including football, tennis, basketball, hockey and much more. Choose from 30+ sports and 6000+ competitions and our tailored notifications will let you know about every important action of the match. 
 
Download Flashscore now and read the game like no one else!

Key features:
• Fastest live results: Get real-time updates with detailed statistics, xG data, unique player and team ratings, live standings and match updates.
• In-depth sports news: Stay informed with exclusive interviews, transfer news & rumours, and in-depth data analysis.
• Personalized favourites: Receive top news notifications, goal alerts, and customized reminders for your favourite teams, competitions or matches.
• Follow your favourite players: Add them to your list and allow notifications so that you never miss their presence in the starting lineup, goals, bookings or ratings.
• Expert match previews: Access selected opportunities and stats to enhance your sports prediction accuracy.
• Predicted lineups: Stay one step ahead and find out who is likely to start in the upcoming match given current form, unexpected injuries or lineup changes.
• Detailed player stats: Check out expected goals (xG), expected assists (xA), the number of shots, passes, touches, chances created, tackles, saves and other key statistics for all the players that appear on the pitch.

LIVE SPORTS SCORES & NEWS, FAST AND ACCURATE

• SPEED: Whether a goal is scored, red card issued, set or period is over, you will know at the same time as the live audience.

• DATA-DRIVEN NEWS: Breaking news and detailed coverage with unique sports data visualizations, tactical insights, expert opinions or featured articles.

• GREAT COVERAGE: You can find football live scores, tennis scores, basketball results, hockey online, golf leaderboard and more than 30 other sports (snooker, baseball, MMA ...) in our app. 


Coverage of major global events & local competitions: 
Football: Premier League, Championship, League One, League Two, FA Cup, LaLiga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Champions League (UCL), Europa League, Europa Conference League, Club World Cup
Tennis: ATP/WTA Tour tournaments including Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), ATP Finals, Davis Cup
Basketball: NBA, Euroleague, ACB, LNB, Lega A, World Cup
Hockey: NHL, DEL, SHL, IIHF World Championship
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam, World Matchplay, UK Open, World Grand Prix
Golf: British Open (The Open), Masters, US Open, PGA Championship, Ryder Cup, Players Championship
Baseball: MLB, KBO, NPB, KBO, LVBP, LMB, World Baseball Classic
Snooker: World Championship, UK Championship, The Masters
Volleyball: SuperLega, Nations League, Nations League Women, CEV Champions League
Badminton: BWF World Championships, Thomas Cup, Uber Cup, Sudirman Cup
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam
Motorsport: Formula 1 (F1), MotoGP, Moto2, Nascar, Dakar
MMA: UFC, Bellator MMA, KSW, Оktagon MMA, PFL, ONE Championship


NO MORE MISSED MATCHES OR UPDATES

• FAVOURITE TEAMS AND MATCHES: Don’t waste your time, and follow only your favourite matches, teams and competitions.

• NOTIFICATIONS AND ALERTS: Match starts, line-ups, goals - you will not miss any of it again. Just select your favorite matches and wait for your mobile device to let you know.


LIVE RESULTS, TABLES AND MATCH DETAILS

• LIVE COMMENTARY: Unable to watch the match on TV? No problem: stay up-to-date with our detailed live text commentary.

• LIVE TABLES: One goal can change a lot. Our live standings will show you if a scored goal has changed the league ranking, as well as the current top scorers table.


Terms of Use: https://livesport.eu/terms-of-use/en-gb
Privacy Policy: https://livesport.eu/privacy-policy/en-gb

Experience Formula 1 like never before with our official app!

Your one-stop hub keeps you updated with the latest F1 news, thrilling highlights, race results, action-packed videos, real-time results and detailed schedules.

Stay ahead of the curve with:
•	The latest F1 news and expert technical analysis
•	Race weekend schedules and real-time results
•	Manage your F1 Fantasy team 
•	Free Leaderboard with live timings
•	Driver and conductor standings 

For F1 TV Access® subscribers, unlock a world of exclusive content including:
•	Live telemetry data and session insights, including comprehensive tyre Information, lap times, speed and DRS.
•	Real-time interactive Driver Tracker Maps
•	Live English audio commentary
•	Listen to the drama unfold with the best of Team Radio

Download now for your ultimate companion into the world of Formula 1.

How to subscribe to F1® TV

F1® TV puts you in the driving seat – with race highlights, live timing and live streaming (available only in certain countries). You can subscribe to F1® TV with an annual or monthly subscription. 

Subscriptions renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours beforehand. You can turn off auto-renew at any time through your iTunes account.

description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

For all basketball fans, you can now follow the Lebanese League games live on the new “Lebanese Basketball Championship“ application.

The application which is the first of its kind will feature coverage of all the division one league games, whereby fans can follow the games play by play updates with live stats and photos.

Fans can also keep abreast of what’s going on around the league through the application’s news section.

------------------------------------------------------

NB: this application is in no mean related to the "Federation Lebanaise de Basketball"

Experience the ultimate sports journey with Drama Live and discover the true essence of sports.

The new Premier League App provides real-time access to every score,
stat & story from the most watched football league in the world.


Follow the action live with Matchday Live, featuring verified live scores,
stats and stories from every match; Discover more with the PL Companion;
and Join myPremierLeague to personalise the App to the Matches, Players
and Clubs that matter most to you, play Fantasy Premier League, listen to
Premier League Radio, and watch every Premier League match ever played.


Follow live, get closer to the Premier League’s Clubs and Players, and shape

Follow every game with Matchday Live:
Verified live scores, statistics and table updates,
including links to watch official broadcasts live
wherever you are

Don’t miss a moment with Matchday Stories:
Vertical storytelling of every match from every
ground as it happens

Personalise your app with myPremierLeague:
Follow the players, Clubs and matches that
matter most to you

Listen live with Premier League Radio:
All the action as it happens from around the
Premier League (excl. UK and Ireland)

Play Fantasy Premier League:
The world’s biggest fantasy football game,
in Classic, Draft and Challenge format

Explore every Premier League match ever played:
Including video, statistics and kits since 1992

Discover clubs and players:
Get closer with behind the scenes stories

At Sportciety, we aim to make sports more Accessible, more Connected and more Exposed than ever. 

Our Goal is to build a community through Sports, where Players, Trainers and Clubs can stay connected all together and benefit from their online presence.

As a Sports Player, this platform allows you to:
-Browse, Find and Book Courts, Trainers and Gyms; Countless Sports are available, and more will be added with time.
-Review the Clubs and Trainers you booked.
-Create and host Private or Public Activities.
-Connect with Friends and Invite them to your Bookings.
-Find an Available Court based on the Sport, Day and Time you select.

As for Trainers and Clubs, you can also:
-Manage your available Sports and Courts.
-Manage Booking requests, Schedules and Accounting tables.
-Expose your Offerings and Experience.
-Stay Connected to Players through our Chat Feature.

Stay connected and tuned in, a lot more feature will be available with time.

"Yalla Shoot" - A specialized app for providing comprehensive details of football matches, including real-time match tracking.

1 - Match schedule with customized views.
2 - Latest football news through our exclusive coverage.
3 - The lineup with a live rating of the players
4 - Live teams and players ranking.
5 - A profile for each player contains statistics and information.
6 - Real-time statistics during matches.

And many, many more features.
